A lovely Fall evening. Enjoy the peace of this day.
Face Tracking with ARKit - Fall 2017 - Videos - Apple Developer

The Shortest Night of Sleep in the US in 2017! We looked at the data, millions of nights of sleep using the Sleeptracker Predictive Open Analytics and here it is. At first we were incredulous because we thought that Valentine's day or Halloween night would be shorter. Not so.  Superbowl night still has us all on the average sleeping less than any other night in 2017. It's not a matter of opinions, it's what the data shows!

Imagine a learning environment where instead of having video games interfering with classroom instruction, video game technology is at the core of your instructional paradigm. Video games are a dominant form of entertainment today because they immersive and exciting. On planet earth, we spend 3 Billion hours a week playing video games; There are nearly 2 Billion smart phones in the world; 1 Billion people are currently learning English as a second language; And Virtual Reality was just featured on the cover of Time Magazine. Our company, FluentWorlds, has taken advantage of this confluence of industry trends and built an App for your smartphone or tablet specifically designed to teach English as a Second language while playing a serious game. Learning a foreign language is always easiest when you are IMMERSED in an environment. FluentWorlds allows language learners to immerse themselves in a Video Game just like you would be if playing Candy Crush without the cost of actually going to New York, Las Vegas, or London.  Users travel through through a series of 3d Virtual environments from the comfort of their smart phone or tablet. Our first language App is written for native Spanish speakers who are interested in learning English as a Second Language. The Ability to speak English is no longer a "nice to have"​ it is a "Must have.  The PhD studies of the Founder of FluentWorlds, Dr. Linda Bradford, showed that student learning outcomes are higher when playing a virtual game than in a physical classroom. Users enter a series of 3d virtual world games allowing avatars to learn and interact in a simulated game situation. While in the 3D adventures, they will learn social language skills - those one would use in a hotel, airport, home or restaurant, etc. It is Magical! Fluentworlds changes the world of eLearning forever.
I am published frequently as a Contributor to the Huffington Post on subjects like Networking, Human Resources, Sports, Tech and Business
Up Your Game - 6 Timeless Networking Principles

Up Your Game tells the story of my six UP Principles for success - Start Up, Show Up, Follow Up, Stand Up, Link up and Scale Up. It is endorsed by Larry King, Steve Wozniak, Mitt Romney, Eric Schmidt, former Miss America Sharlene Wells Hawkes, and NFL Hall of Famer, and Steve Young.

Help guide the future of the VIEW - Imagine a classroom or corporate training environment where instead of having video games interfering with classroom instruction, video game technology is at the core of your instructional paradigm. It's here: www.3d-view.com. The VIEW has a series of the most advanced 3D virtual educational environments on the planet.  This cloud-based platform is quick to setup, easy to use, and is a real game changer.
I am an Advisor to the Women's Technology council of Utah - the premier organization promoting women in technology.

I have known David for years and have always looked up at his ability to connect with people and give first. He has an abundant mentality that makes him a positive person to interact with and he is always looking out for ways he can help others. He has amassed an incredible network because of his personality, expertise and openness that I believe has led to his great successes. He has been an absolute champion on QuotaDeck.com as well, topping the leaderboard multiple times and helping us with feedback and intros to people he knows. I hope to continue working with and learning from him in the future.

David is an outstanding senior executive with a unique ability to recognize, develop and manage talent, the type of person who makes those around him better.  He talks to everyone as an equal, values input from all angles and leads through example.  David is a great fit for any organization that seeks to bring a creative energy to its business.   He has a unique skill set and understands how to build a high quality culture in an organization with a focus on positive reinforcement and development of employees' strengths. I have learned a tremendous amount from David, and value him as a tremendous resource for advice.

October 21, 2013, David was senior to Scot but didn’t manage directly

Working with David is high energy and loads of fun. David is a CEO with high expectations, get it done attitude, with a fair-minded approach. A rare combination. As David says "is not about the 'what' but the 'who' ". He truly lives up to that mantra. His leadership style is one of example and I'm pleased to say that I work with David and count him among my friends. One of the biggest take aways I have from my time working with David is to help others in business without any expectation of receiving anything in return. This may seem counterintuitive to most but when you really think about it - it makes great sense. If more business engagements took David's approach I believe business deals would flourish on a much grander scale.

summary: I have been an Exec/CEO/Chairman at Industry leaders in High Tech like Fusion-io, Novell,  HireVue and now serve as CEO of FluentWorlds.  Imagine a 3D virtual classroom where instead of having video games interfering with classroom instruction, video game technology is at the core of your instructional paradigm. FluentWorlds is transforming the way  language training is done. I am also a popular author and much sought-after public speaker with my 5 Star rated book - "Up Your Game" endorsed by Eric Schmidt, Larry King, Mitt Romney, Steve Wozniak, & Steve Young.  In September of 2017, Utah Business IQ gave me their 2nd ever Life-Time Achievement Award. In 2013, I was inducted into the Utah Technology Hall of Fame and have also been "CEO and Executive of the Year for the State." During my tenure as CEO at Fusion-io, The Wall Street Journal named us the #1 Most  Promising I.T. Company in America. The most fun part, was sourcing and recruiting Steve Wozniak, Co-Founder of Apple, to work as Chief Scientist for us. During my tenure as CEO and Chairman of HireVue, this Enterprise Software company increased sales 1400% and was named H.R. product of the Year in 2011, 2012 and 2014. We raised became the #1 Digital interviewing product globally. I was named Alumnus of the year of the BYU Law School, served as Chair of the Business Software Alliance - then the world's top Tech Trade group. My wife named me the Human Internet. In 2015, we were named one of America's "Couples of the Year."Specialties: Leadership in Tech, Social Media,  Mergers and acquisitions, private equity funding, venture capital, and strategic alliances. My involvement in the computer industry from the earliest days of the PC led to my being featured in the PBS special, Nerds 2.0.1: A History of the Internet. I am married to Linda, a Ph.D. in Instructional Psychology & together we have 4 children, and reside in Provo, Utah and Newport Beach, CA. Linda refers to me as the Human Internet.
name: David Bradford
title: CEO FluentWorlds
